wishes.title: Adventure Theme
wishes.message: May your birthday be the start of a year filled with wonderful adventures and exciting journeys! Wishing you happiness in all your endeavors.

wishes.title: Joy Theme
wishes.message: Wishing you a birthday overflowing with happiness, laughter, and joy that lasts throughout the coming year! May all your dreams come true.

wishes.title: Success Theme
wishes.message: May your birthday mark the beginning of your most successful year yet! Wishing you achievements, prosperity, and fulfillment in all you do.

wishes.title: Friendship Theme
wishes.message: On your special day, I want you to know how much you mean to me. Wishing you a birthday as wonderful as the friendship we share!

wishes.title: Love Theme
wishes.message: Happy birthday to someone who makes my world brighter every day! May your birthday be as special and beautiful as you are to me.

wishes.title: Adventure Theme 1
wishes.message: Every year is another peak to conquer. May this birthday mark the beginning of your most victorious climb yet!

wishes.title: Phoenix Theme
wishes.message: Like the phoenix, may you rise stronger with each passing year. Your best chapters are still being written!

wishes.title: Compass Theme
wishes.message: May this birthday point you toward your true north - where purpose meets passion and dreams become destinations!

wishes.title: Story Theme
wishes.message: Today begins a new chapter in your extraordinary story. Make it one where obstacles become opportunities!

wishes.title: Light Theme
wishes.message: You've been a light for so many others - may this birthday illuminate your own brightest path forward!

wishes.title: Growth Theme
wishes.message: The mightiest oaks grow from small seeds. Keep nurturing your potential - your growth inspires us all!

wishes.title: Starry Theme
wishes.message: Your potential is as limitless as the stars. Chart a course this year that makes the universe proud!

wishes.title: Bridge Theme
wishes.message: Birthdays are bridges to better versions of ourselves. Step boldly onto yours - the view gets better ahead!

wishes.title: Diamond Theme
wishes.message: Remember: Diamonds form under pressure. Every challenge you've faced has made you more brilliant!

wishes.title: Journey Theme
wishes.message: May your coming year have just enough wind to be exciting, and just enough calm to enjoy the journey!

wishes.title: Artistry Theme
wishes.message: Your life is your greatest masterpiece - keep adding bold strokes this year!

wishes.title: Vintage Theme
wishes.message: Like a fine wine, you just keep getting better with time. Cheers to your vintage year!

wishes.title: Sparkle Theme
wishes.message: May your birthday sparkle with moments of love, laughter, and happy surprises!

wishes.title: Level Up Theme
wishes.message: You're not getting older, you're leveling up! What amazing power will you unlock this year?

wishes.title: Cake Theme
wishes.message: Birthdays are nature's way of telling us to eat more cake! Enjoy every delicious moment!

wishes.title: Smile Theme
wishes.message: Your smile is contagious, your spirit is inspiring - may your birthday be as wonderful as you are!

wishes.title: Celebration Theme
wishes.message: Today we celebrate the incredible person you are and the amazing person you're becoming!

wishes.title: Starry Wish Theme
wishes.message: Like a shooting star, may your birthday wishes all come true in brilliant fashion!

wishes.title: CEO Theme
wishes.message: You're the CEO of your life - may this birthday bring a raise in happiness!

wishes.title: Legacy Theme
wishes.message: Age is merely the number of years the world has been enjoying you. Here's to many more!
